title: L.A. Hotspots
name: L.A. Hotspots
description:
A Map by Brandonm

For visitors to L.A.

properties.name: 101 Coffee Shop
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm  6145 Franklin Avenue, Los Angeles, CA, 90028One of the best, coolest coffee shops in LA. This is where they filmed Swingers and it\'s still a good celebrity sighting place. I\'ve seen Jack Black, Johnny Knoxville, Kelly Osbourne, Elijah Wood and others. If you go you MUST have the Waffle Brownie Sunday. It\'s amazing.

properties.name: 101 Coffee Shop
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm  6145 Franklin Avenue, Los Angeles, CA, 90028Good food, great atmosphere, possible celebrity sighting. You have to get the Waffle Brownie Sundae. Desert will never be the same.

properties.name: 3rd Street Promenade
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmGood eats, fun shopping and people watching. A good way to kill time.

properties.name: Akbar
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm4356 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAGay/Bi-Sexual/Straight bar. Great jukebox up front. I liked it better before they added the big dance area in the back

properties.name: Beautiful scenic Sunset Blvd Drive
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmIf you have time to get to the beach and are tired of the freeways, take Sunset. It\'s gorgeous. Start at either the Sunset Strip near La Cienega or start at the 405 Freeway offramp and drive West til you hit the ocean.

properties.name: Cat N' Fiddle Pub & Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Josephine 6530 Sunset Blvd, Hollywood, CAi love their patio

properties.name: Catalina Island
properties.description: Posted by Josephine

properties.name: Dolce
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm8284 Melrose Ave, West Hollywood, CAHip Hollywood scene... some celebs

properties.name: East West Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm801 Larrabee St, West HollywoodRated one of the top WeHo bars. A little bit of NY and LA

properties.name: Hollywood Sign
properties.description: Posted by Josephineused to see this all the time when I visited my cousin.... and then had GOD at the 101

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm1760 Hillhurst Ave, Los Angeles, CAThere\'s No Place Like...

properties.name: J.R.'s BBQ
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmThe best authentic BBQ food that I found in LA. Always friendly service and a warm home-y feel.

properties.name: Kodak Theater
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm Permanent home of the Oscars. Good eats and shops. Great view of the Hollywood sign

properties.name: Lucy's Mexican Cantina
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmRight across the street from film studios. If you go during the day you might see a celebrity or two. Food is delicious.

properties.name: Mann Chinese Theater
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm Footprints of stars. Hollywood history

properties.name: Melrose Strip
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmStretches from Fairfax to La Brea. Lots of independent shops where you can usually haggle a lower price as well as major chain shops.

properties.name: Newsroom Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm 120 N Robertson Blvdgood food, huge outdoor patio

properties.name: Ritzy Melrose Strip
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmMelrose West of Fairfax quickly became flooded with upscale shopping while I lived in the area. You can find stores like Fred Segal, Marc Jacobs, Puma, Antique Denim, Energie, Miu Miu, Miss Sixty, Giant Robot, Paul Frank and many more.

properties.name: Robertson Blvd
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmDesigner label shopping and celebrity sighting. You can always see someone at Ivy or paparazzi standing outside a store waiting for Paris Hilton or Lindsay Lohan.

properties.name: Rodeo Drive
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmLuxury shopping. Smells like money.

properties.name: Saddle Ranch
properties.description: Posted by Josephine8371 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CAride the bull.. of course

properties.name: Santa Monica Pier
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm200 Santa Monica Pier, Santa Monica, CaGreat beach. Some fun rides and games.

properties.name: Staples Center
properties.description: Posted by Josephine1111 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CAKings & Lakers games Dave Matthews Band - 02.27.02

properties.name: Sunset Strip
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmFrom Crescent Heights to Doheny Dr. Lots of cool bars & Clubs--famous ones like The Whisky, The Roxy, The Rainbow Room, Viper Room (where River Pheonix lost it), Chateau Marmont (hotel where Lindsay Lohan lost it), Laugh Factory (comedy club where Michael Richards lost it)

properties.name: Sushi on Sunset
properties.description: Posted by Josephine8264 W Sunset Blvd, West Hollywood, CA

properties.name: The Abbey
properties.description: Posted by Josephine 692 N Robertson Blvd, West Hollywood, CA

properties.name: The Avalon/The Palace
properties.description: Posted by Josephine1735 Vine St, Los Angeles, CAKROQ Nights (back in the day at the Palace!) The Dan Band - 11.23.03 Hot Hot Heat - June 2004

properties.name: The Dresden Room
properties.description: Posted by Josephine1760 N Vermont Ave, Los Angeles, CAwatch Swingers

properties.name: The Forum
properties.description: Posted by Josephine, Inglewood, CARed Hot Chili Peppers - 1995

properties.name: The Grove
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmIt got way too crowded, way too quick. But a fun place to shop, grab a quick bite and see a movie. Spent a lot of time here in \'04 and \'05

properties.name: The Ivy
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmSurrounded by Paparazzi and filled with industry people and celebrities. It\'s definitely an L.A. landmark.

properties.name: Venice Boardwalk
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmInteresting people, fun street artists, great beach, random art, fun atmosphere. Good most of the year

properties.name: Walt Disney Concert Hall
properties.description: Posted by Brandonm 111 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012In the middle of downtown LA. Beautiful Frank Gherry building.

properties.name: West Hollywood (WeHo)
properties.description: Posted by BrandonmThe gay hotspot
